sense.def:
Kadar človek
decides to do something
, se odloči, da bo nekaj storil.

seg.quote: What made you decide to get married?
I'm glad you decided against a career as a waiter.
She decided that she would leave.
He has a month to decide whether he's going to stay.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
decided
, se ljudje odločijo, kaj bi moralo biti storjeno.

seg.quote: The case is to be decided by the International Court.

sense.def:
Če neki dogodek ali dejstvo
decides something
, zagotovi, da je določena posledica nujna ali neizogibna.

seg.quote: It was this that decided the fate of the company.
I suppose cost shouldn't be a deciding factor.

sense.def:
To decide that something is the case
pomeni ustvariti si neko mnenje, potem ko razmislimo o dejstvih.

seg.quote: He decided that the doorbell was broken.
I couldn't decide whether she was joking or not.

sense.def:
To decide on something
ali
to decide upon something
pomeni izbrati med dvema ali več možnostmi.

seg.quote: He decided on a career in the army.
